item.description: ‚úÖ Spread over 13.70 acres of prime land. ‚úÖ Gated complex with a common boundary wall for complete safety and […]
item.content:encoded:
‚úÖ Spread over 13.70 acres of prime land.
‚úÖ Gated complex with a common boundary wall for complete safety and peace of mind.
‚úÖ Enter through the grand 80 feet wide entrance gate.
‚úÖ Move seamlessly on the 30 feet wide internal roads.
‚úÖ Feel secure with 24×7 CCTV surveillance and security.
‚úÖ Experience hassle-free 24×7 water supply.
‚úÖ Enjoy round-the-clock power supply to common areas.
‚úÖ Relax in the peaceful environment with a separate play area for kids and sit-out area for senior citizens. Achieve a healthy lifestyle with the open gym, meditation area, and yoga lawn.
‚úÖ Enjoy a pollution-free environment for a healthy living.
‚úÖ Seek blessings at the in-house temple.
‚úÖ Save time with convenient shopping for your daily needs.
